contextId.information: This is a double negative that emphasizes that they took all of the 60 cities. AT: "we took every one of the cities" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_doublenegatives]])
contextId.quote: there was not one city that we did not take

contextId.information: This can be stated in a positive form. AT: "Yahweh will consider him guilty" or "Yahweh will punish him" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_doublenegatives]])
contextId.quote: Yahweh will not hold him guiltless

contextId.information: This can be stated in positive form. AT: "that you take good care of" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_doublenegatives]])
This can be stated in positive form. AT: "For there will always be poor people in the land" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_doublenegatives]])
contextId.quote: For the poor will never cease to exist in the land
